name: Trick or Orc Smash
description:
You are the orc horde leader and you have decided to reward your orc minions by taking them to snack on delicious treats at a nearby amusement park.

Take command of your orcish horde to make sure they don't over indulge, get left out, or slaughter each other.

They will follow your orders but they will get bored quickly when not given orders. 

They're a little high maintenance but they deserve some tasty snacks once in a while. Be a good commander and help them enjoy their treats without killing themselves.

Controls

Left mouse button (Select/Drag select)

Right mouse button (Issue move command)

Pay careful attention to the thought cloud above their heads. Red means they are maxing out on snacks and are close to popping. Black is the opposite end o the spectrum and means they are getting real cranky and are about to enter a frenzy.

Tools:

Blender - For the cheese and the chocolate
Rider - for the coding
Unity - for the engine

Assets employed
A* Pathfinding pro - for pathing -
Flat cell kit, for the outline renderer - 
Stylized explosions - for the orc splats - 
Micro monsters & heroes pack - for the orc - 
Quick outline - for the outlines -
Synty studios city pack - for the assets that that went into making the map -
High quality music audio mega pack - for the sweet tunes

Good luck commander!
